# langsmith_workspace (Data Source)

Use this data source to look up a LangSmith workspace by ID or display name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "langsmith_workspace" "example" {
  display_name = "default"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `display_name` (String) The display name of the workspace. Either `id` or `display_name` must be specified.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the workspace. Either `id` or `display_name` must be specified.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp of the workspace.
- `is_personal` (Boolean) Whether this is a personal workspace.
- `organization_id` (String) The organization ID that owns this workspace.
- `tenant_handle` (String) The tenant handle of the workspace.
